title: Brunias Free Women of Color Image MCQ 1

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the artistâ€™s likely purpose in painting this particular subject?

choices.label: To advocate for violent rebellion against British colonial authorities
To demonstrate the racial oppression suffered by free people of color in the West Indies
To argue for the respectability of free people of color
To call for greater emigration by Europeans to the West Indies

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
